content.heroTitle: Break Into Remote High-Ticket Sales in 90 Days
content.heroSubtitle: Learn elite closing skills, build your personal brand, and get placed into real sales roles earning £3K-£8K/month
content.heroDescription: The placement-first system for 9-to-5 workers who want to escape the grind and master remote sales.

pillars.title: Elite Sales Training
pillars.description: Master the 'New Psychology of Sales' — gap selling, objection handling, tonality, and the question framework that makes prospects sell themselves. No theory BS, just what actually closes deals.

pillars.title: Personal Brand Building
pillars.description: Build authority on Instagram & LinkedIn so role offers come to YOU. We teach you how to position yourself as a professional closer, creating long-term leverage beyond just one role.

pillars.title: Real Role Placements
pillars.description: Get placed into live sales roles within 30-60 days. SMMA agencies, premium mentorships, AI companies, ecom brands — we connect you to actual businesses that need closers.

content.ctaSubtitle: Book a call to see if Remote Sales Academy is right for you

testimonials.name: James R.
testimonials.description: Went from 9-to-5 warehouse job to closing for an AI company in 60 days. This system actually works.

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.description: Never did sales before. Mike's training got me placed into an SMMA role within a month. Now I work from home.

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.description: The personal brand piece is genius. I now get inbound offers from companies wanting me to close for them.

seo.title: Remote Sales Academy - Break Into High-Ticket Sales in 90 Days
seo.description: Learn elite closing skills, build your personal brand, and get placed into real remote sales roles. Earn £3K-£8K/month in commissions.
seo.keywords: remote sales, high ticket sales, sales training, sales closer, work from home, remote jobs, 9 to 5 escape
